Seattle, WA - ExtraHop Networks - http://www.extrahop.com/jobs

We do network-based application performance management. That means a customer can understand what's going on in their datacenter without having to deploy a software agent anywhere.

We have several positions open. We're interested in talking with people who enjoy C, TCP/IP networking, systems programming, GPGPU programming, parsing and/or HTML5/JS/CSS programming.

If you want to work at a company with a strong engineering team, founded and run by engineers, this is the place. Send us an email at jobs+hn@extrahop.com.
